mapper.sql: FIELD_ID, TASK_INST_ID, FIELD_STRING_VALUE, FIELD_DATE_VALUE, FIELD_INTEGER_VAL, FIELD_NUMBER_VAL, FILE_NAME, TASK_DEF_ID, PROC_INST_ID, PROC_DEF_ID, FORM_DEF_ID, FIELD_PATH, SWF_PATH
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from FIELD_INSTANCE
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into FIELD_INSTANCE (FIELD_ID, TASK_INST_ID, FIELD_STRING_VALUE, FIELD_DATE_VALUE, FIELD_INTEGER_VAL, FIELD_NUMBER_VAL, FILE_NAME, TASK_DEF_ID, PROC_INST_ID, PROC_DEF_ID, FORM_DEF_ID, FIELD_PATH, SWF_PATH) values (#{fieldId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{taskInstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fieldStringValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fieldDateValue,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fieldIntegerVal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fieldNumberVal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskDefId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{procInstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{procDefId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{formDefId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fieldPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{swfPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into FIELD_INSTANCE
FIELD_ID,
TASK_INST_ID,
FIELD_STRING_VALUE,
FIELD_DATE_VALUE,
FIELD_INTEGER_VAL,
FIELD_NUMBER_VAL,
FILE_NAME,
TASK_DEF_ID,
PROC_INST_ID,
PROC_DEF_ID,
FORM_DEF_ID,
FIELD_PATH,
SWF_PATH,

mapper.update:
update FIELD_INSTANCE
FIELD_ID = #{record.fieldId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TASK_INST_ID = #{record.taskInstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FIELD_STRING_VALUE = #{record.fieldStringValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FIELD_DATE_VALUE = #{record.fieldDateValue,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FIELD_INTEGER_VAL = #{record.fieldIntegerVal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FIELD_NUMBER_VAL = #{record.fieldNumberVal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FILE_NAME = #{record.fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TASK_DEF_ID = #{record.taskDefId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROC_INST_ID = #{record.procInstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROC_DEF_ID = #{record.procDefId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FORM_DEF_ID = #{record.formDefId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FIELD_PATH = #{record.fieldPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SWF_PATH = #{record.swfPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update FIELD_INSTANCE set FIELD_ID = #{record.fieldId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TASK_INST_ID = #{record.taskInstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FIELD_STRING_VALUE = #{record.fieldStringValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FIELD_DATE_VALUE = #{record.fieldDateValue,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FIELD_INTEGER_VAL = #{record.fieldIntegerVal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FIELD_NUMBER_VAL = #{record.fieldNumberVal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FILE_NAME = #{record.fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TASK_DEF_ID = #{record.taskDefId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROC_INST_ID = #{record.procInstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROC_DEF_ID = #{record.procDefId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FORM_DEF_ID = #{record.formDefId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FIELD_PATH = #{record.fieldPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SWF_PATH = #{record.swfPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update FIELD_INSTANCE
FIELD_STRING_VALUE = #{fieldStringValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FIELD_DATE_VALUE = #{fieldDateValue,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FIELD_INTEGER_VAL = #{fieldIntegerVal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FIELD_NUMBER_VAL = #{fieldNumberVal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FILE_NAME = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TASK_DEF_ID = #{taskDefId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROC_INST_ID = #{procInstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROC_DEF_ID = #{procDefId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FORM_DEF_ID = #{formDefId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FIELD_PATH = #{fieldPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SWF_PATH = #{swfPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where FIELD_ID = #{fieldId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and TASK_INST_ID = #{taskInstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update FIELD_INSTANCE set FIELD_STRING_VALUE = #{fieldStringValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FIELD_DATE_VALUE = #{fieldDateValue,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FIELD_INTEGER_VAL = #{fieldIntegerVal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FIELD_NUMBER_VAL = #{fieldNumberVal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FILE_NAME = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TASK_DEF_ID = #{taskDefId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROC_INST_ID = #{procInstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROC_DEF_ID = #{procDefId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FORM_DEF_ID = #{formDefId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FIELD_PATH = #{fieldPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SWF_PATH = #{swfPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where FIELD_ID = #{fieldId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and TASK_INST_ID = #{taskInstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT #{districtCode}||TASK_INST_ID AS TASK_INST_ID, FIELD_ID, FIELD_STRING_VALUE, FIELD_DATE_VALUE, FIELD_INTEGER_VAL, FIELD_NUMBER_VAL, FILE_NAME, TASK_DEF_ID, #{districtCode}||PROC_INST_ID AS PROC_INST_ID, PROC_DEF_ID, FORM_DEF_ID, FIELD_PATH FROM FIELD_INSTANCE WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM CASE_MODIFIED_INFO WHERE EXP_STATE = 'N' AND TASK_INST_ID||'-'||FIELD_ID = KEY_VALUE AND TABLE_NAME = #{tableName})

SELECT FIELD_ID, TASK_INST_ID, FIELD_STRING_VALUE, FIELD_DATE_VALUE, FIELD_INTEGER_VAL, FIELD_NUMBER_VAL, FILE_NAME, TASK_DEF_ID, PROC_INST_ID, PROC_DEF_ID, FORM_DEF_ID, FIELD_PATH, SWF_PATH FROM FIELD_INSTANCE WHERE TASK_INST_ID = #{taskInstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
